---
title: "French with Kunal"
format: 
  html:
    include-in-header: 
      text: |
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@700&family=Montserrat:wght@400;600;700&family=Special+Elite&family=Courier+Prime:ital,wght@0,400;1,400&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
        <style>
          :root {
              --primary-dark-bg: #2e2e2e;
              --dark-text: #2e2e2e;
              --light-text: #fff;
              --accent-green: #5F9F72;
              --button-enroll: #C6BCBA;
              --button-free-trial: #946534;
          }

          body {
              font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
              margin: 0;
              padding: 0;
              background-color: #f8f9fa;
          }

          .navbar {
              background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
              position: fixed;
              width: 100%;
              top: 0;
              z-index: 1000;
          }

          .navbar-brand {
              font-family: 'Special Elite', cursive;
              color: var(--light-text) !important;
              font-size: 1.8rem;
              font-weight: 700;
              transition: color 0.3s ease;
          }

          .navbar-brand:hover {
              color: var(--accent-green) !important;
          }

          .navbar-nav .nav-link {
              font-family: 'Special Elite', cursive;
              color: var(--light-text) !important;
              margin-left: 20px;
              font-size: 1.1rem;
              transition: color 0.3s ease;
          }

          .navbar-nav .nav-link:hover {
              color: var(--accent-green) !important;
          }

          .hero-section {
              height: 100vh;
              display: flex;
              align-items: center;
              justify-content: start;
              padding-left: 10%;
              padding-right: 20px;
              box-sizing: border-box;
              position: relative;
              color: white;
              text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
              overflow: hidden;
          }

          .hero-section::before {
              content: "";
              position: absolute;
              top: 0;
              left: 0;
              width: 100%;
              height: 100%;
              background:
                  linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0) 100%),
                  url('images/french-books.jpg') right / cover no-repeat;
              background-size: auto 100%, cover;
              background-position: left, right;
              z-index: -1;
          }

          .hero-content {
              max-width: 50%;
              text-align: left;
          }

          .hero-content p {
              font-family: 'Courier Prime', monospace;
              font-style: italic;
              font-size: 1.1rem;
              line-height: 1.6;
              margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
          }

          .hero-content h1 {
              font-family: 'Special Elite', cursive;
              font-size: 2.8rem;
              font-weight: 500;
              margin-bottom: 1rem;
          }

          .hero-content .subtitle {
              font-family: 'Courier Prime', monospace;
              font-style: normal;
              font-size: 1rem;
              font-weight: 600;
              color: var(--accent-green);
              margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
              text-transform: uppercase;
              letter-spacing: 1px;
          }

          .btn-custom {
              padding: 12px 28px;
              border-radius: 30px;
              font-weight: 600;
              text-decoration: none;
              display: inline-block;
              transition: all 0.3s ease;
              margin-right: 15px;
              border: none;
              color: var(--light-text);
          }

          .btn-enroll-now {
              background-color: var(--button-enroll);
              box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
          }

          .btn-enroll-now:hover {
              background-color: #A6A09E;
              transform: translateY(-2px);
              box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
          }

          .btn-free-trial {
              background-color: var(--button-free-trial);
              box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
          }

          .btn-free-trial:hover {
              background-color: #7D572D;
              transform: translateY(-2px);
              box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
          }

          .footer {
              background-color: var(--primary-dark-bg);
              color: var(--light-text);
              padding: 20px 0;
              text-align: center;
              font-size: 0.8rem;
          }

          .footer p {
              margin-bottom: 5px;
          }

          .footer .social-icons a {
              color: var(--light-text);
              font-size: 1.2rem;
              margin: 0 8px;
              transition: color 0.3s ease;
          }

          .footer .social-icons a:hover {
              color: var(--accent-green);
          }

          @media (max-width: 991.98px) {
              .hero-content {
                  max-width: 70%;
              }
              .hero-content h1 {
                  font-size: 2.5rem;
              }
              .hero-content p {
                  font-size: 1rem;
              }
              .navbar-nav .nav-link {
                  font-size: 1rem;
              }
          }

          @media (max-width: 767.98px) {
              .hero-section {
                  padding-left: 5%;
                  text-align: center;
                  justify-content: center;
              }
              .hero-content {
                  max-width: 90%;
              }
              .hero-content h1 {
                  font-size: 2rem;
              }
              .hero-content .subtitle {
                  font-size: 0.9rem;
              }
              .btn-custom {
                  display: block;
                  width: 80%;
                  margin: 10px auto;
              }
              .hero-section::before {
                  background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 100%),
                              url('images/french-books.jpg') center / cover no-repeat;
                  background-size: cover, cover;
                  background-position: center, center;
              }
              .footer {
                  padding: 15px 0;
                  font-size: 0.75rem;
              }
          }
        </style>
    include-after-body:
      text: |
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
---
